subject: EPUB Beautification: Reader View CSS + EPUB Chaptering
message:
Implement the Reader View & EPUB Beautification plan from docs/plans/2025-12-07-reader-epub-beautify.md. Focus on:

1. CSS upgrades for reader view:
   - Serif body font stack, 70-75ch max-width, 1.6 line-height
   - Role badges (user/assistant/system) with color coding
   - Card-style turns with gentle dividers
   - Light/dark theme toggle

2. EPUB structure improvements:
   - Chapters: Intro (metadata), Body (turns), Entities appendix
   - TOC via nav.xhtml
   - Embed CSS inline

3. Update RenderingService in ies/backend/src/ies_backend/services/rendering_service.py

4. Test that HTML contains role badges and EPUB has required files.

The conversation service already exists at ies/backend/src/ies_backend/services/conversation_service.py - check its render methods.
